Available datasets

Sean Davis seandavi@gmail.com and Vincent J. Carey, stvjc at channing.harvard.edu

April 15, 2020

Source: vignettes/datasets.Rmd
datasets.Rmd

Available datasets

library(DT)
library(sars2pack)
ad = available_datasets()
datatable(ad)

Column names by dataset

cd = lapply(ad$accessor, function(accessor_name) {
    fn = get(accessor_name)
    res = column_summaries(fn())
    res$dataset = accessor_name
    res
})
library(dplyr)
dplyr::bind_rows(cd) %>%
    dplyr::select(name, dataset) %>%
    datatable(rownames=FALSE)
